title: Glorious gluten free Victoria sponge
ingredients: ['For the sponge', '225g gluten free multipurpose white mix', '1 1/2 teaspoons gluten-free baking powder', '170g caster sugar', '170g butter, room temperature', '3 medium eggs', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract', 'For the filling', '50g butter, softened', '110g icing sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '160g jam or lemon curd', 'icing sugar, for dusting']
